name: Canoloth
senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 19

abilities.name: Dimensional Lock.
abilities.description: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The canoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Uncanny Senses.
abilities.description: The canoloth can't be surprised while it isn't incapacitated.
